attributes.action: Modify the Chief Science Advisor title to Chief Technical Advisor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A simple wording change will include the lamented lack of engineering advice in government.
Science with Engineering cover a wider technical scope.  Engineers deal with so much of the processes for delivery of products they must have a convincing way to contribute through this broader advisory role.
A small change in wording should mean a considerable adjustment in responsibility and approach in providing advice and this action will also demonstrate our government's respect for the engineering community.
